title: gofmt uses tab and it is text-editor dependent
body:
by **arash.kamangir.foss**: 
What does 'go version' print?
go version devel +f8b50ad4cac4 Mon Apr 21 17:00:27 2014 -0700 + linux/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

1. There exist a go file a with no indentation; http://play.golang.org/p/1RlGdrT0f4
2. we format it using `gofmt`; http://play.golang.org/p/duRF5gXJEP

Please provide any additional information below.
The output file uses 8-character tab for indentation. Tab width is dependent on default
settings of a text editor and the formatted file will be shown differently in different
text editors.

Can you make gofmt to produce a file with could be unique among different text editors
with with different default tab widths?
